body_html: I should also note that we've gotten rid of layout in torch.tensor, torch.new_tensor, the only constructor for sparse dtypes currently is sparse_coo_tensor; we probably want another overload that takes a single dense representation.
body_text: I should also note that we've gotten rid of layout in torch.tensor, torch.new_tensor, the only constructor for sparse dtypes currently is sparse_coo_tensor; we probably want another overload that takes a single dense representation.
body: I should also note that we've gotten rid of `layout` in `torch.tensor`, `torch.new_tensor`, the only constructor for sparse dtypes currently is `sparse_coo_tensor`; we probably want another overload that takes a single dense representation.
